scripts.setup: npm install && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run setup:venv && npm run setup:backend-deps
scripts.setup:venv: node -e "const {execSync}=require('child_process');const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const venvPath=path.join('backend','venv');if(fs.existsSync(venvPath)){console.log('Venv already exists, skipping creation');}else{try{execSync('python -m venv backend/venv',{stdio:'inherit'});}catch(e){try{execSync('python3 -m venv backend/venv',{stdio:'inherit'});}catch(e2){console.error('Failed to create venv. Please delete backend/venv manually and try again.');process.exit(1);}}}"
scripts.setup:backend-deps: node -e "const {execSync}=require('child_process');const os=require('os');const path=require('path');const fs=require('fs');const isWin=os.platform()==='win32';const pipPath=path.resolve('backend','venv',isWin?'Scripts':'bin',isWin?'pip.exe':'pip');if(!fs.existsSync(pipPath)){console.error('pip not found at:',pipPath);process.exit(1);}execSync('"'+pipPath+'" install -r backend/requirements.txt',{stdio:'inherit',shell:true});"
scripts.dev:backend: node -e "console.log('Starting backend server...');const {execSync}=require('child_process');const os=require('os');const path=require('path');const isWin=os.platform()==='win32';const pythonPath=path.resolve('backend','venv',isWin?'Scripts':'bin',isWin?'python.exe':'python');execSync('"'+pythonPath+'" -m uvicorn src.main:app --reload --port 8000',{cwd:path.resolve('backend'),stdio:'inherit',shell:true});"
scripts.dev:frontend: node -e "console.log('Waiting for backend to initialize...');setTimeout(()=>{require('child_process').execSync('npm run dev --prefix frontend',{stdio:'inherit'});},3000);"
